title: AMU Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Fixed Salary Worker Post
description: Aligarh Muslim University (AMU) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Fixed Salary Worker Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the AMU Recruitment 202 5 . Interested candidates can apply before the last date of application. If you are looking for more, here is a...
